vocabulary.vocabularyList: SELECT A.*, B.group_name FROM vocabulary A LEFT JOIN user_group B on A.user_group=B.seq $$WHERE$$ ORDER BY A.user_group ASC, A.word ASC
vocabulary.regVocabulary: INSERT INTO vocabulary (word, user_group, regDate) VALUES (?, ?, now())
vocabulary.modVocabulary: UPDATE vocabulary SET word = ?, user_group = ? WHERE seq = ?
vocabulary.checkVocabulary: SELECT * FROM vocabulary WHERE user_group = ? AND word = ? AND deleteYN=0
vocabulary.delVocabulary: UPDATE vocabulary SET deleteYN=1 WHERE SEQ = ?
vocabulary.groupList: SELECT itable.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.group_name AS name FROM vocabulary_group A LEFT JOIN user_group B on A.user_group=B.seq $$WHERE$$ ) itable
vocabulary.regGroup: INSERT INTO vocabulary_group (group_name, user_group, regDate) VALUES (?, ?, now())
vocabulary.modGroup: UPDATE vocabulary_group SET group_name = ?, user_group = ? WHERE seq = ?
vocabulary.delGroup: UPDATE vocabulary_group SET deleteYN=1 WHERE SEQ = ?
vocabulary.groupSubList: SELECT A.*, B.word FROM vocabulary_group_sub A LEFT JOIN vocabulary B ON A.vocabulary_seq=B.seq WHERE A.vocabulary_group_seq = ?
